languages.text: "Шансы выживания данной единицы... сомнительны. Функциональная польза в случае стабилизации жизненных процессов — минимальна. Рекомендуется утилизация".
"The chances of this unit surviving are slim. Functional usefulness in the event of stabilisation of vital processes is minimal. Disposal is recommended."
languages.original_text: "Шансы выживания данной единицы... сомнительны. Функциональная польза в случае стабилизации жизненных процессов — минимальна. Рекомендуется утилизация".

traits.locale_text: "The chances of this unit surviving are slim. Functional usefulness in case of stabilisation of vital processes is minimal. Disposal is recommended."
"The chances of this unit surviving are slim. Functional usefulness in case of stabilisation of vital processes is minimal. Disposal is recommended."

"The chances of this unit surviving are slim. Functional usefulness in the event of stabilisation of vital processes is minimal. Disposal is recommended."

languages.text: «Las probabilidades de supervivencia de esta unidad son mínimas. Su utilidad funcional en caso de estabilización de los procesos vitales es mínima. Se recomienda su eliminación».
languages.original_text: "The chances of this unit surviving are slim. Functional usefulness in the event of stabilisation of vital processes is minimal. Disposal is recommended."

traits.locale_text: «Las probabilidades de supervivencia de esta unidad son mínimas. Su utilidad funcional en caso de estabilización de los procesos vitales es mínima. Se recomienda su eliminación».

languages.text: 「このユニットが生き残る可能性は低い。バイタルプロセスが安定した場合の機能的有用性は最低限である。廃棄を推奨する」
languages.original_text: "The chances of this unit surviving are slim. Functional usefulness in the event of stabilisation of vital processes is minimal. Disposal is recommended."

traits.locale_text: 「このユニットが生き残る可能性は低い。バイタルプロセスが安定した場合の機能的有用性は最低限である。廃棄を推奨する」

languages.text: “这个单位的存活几率非常低。即便生命体征可以稳定下来，功用性也会处于最低等级，建议立刻进行废弃处理。”
languages.original_text: "The chances of this unit surviving are slim. Functional usefulness in the event of stabilisation of vital processes is minimal. Disposal is recommended."

traits.locale_text: “这个单位的存活几率非常低。即便生命体征可以稳定下来，功用性也会处于最低等级，建议立刻进行废弃处理。”

languages.text: "Die Überlebenschance dieser Einheit ist gering. Funktionale Nützlichkeit bei Stabilisierung der Vitalprozesse ist minimal. Ich empfehle Eliminierung."
languages.original_text: "The chances of this unit surviving are slim. Functional usefulness in the event of stabilisation of vital processes is minimal. Disposal is recommended."

traits.locale_text: "Die Überlebenschance dieser Einheit ist gering. Funktionale Nützlichkeit bei Stabilisierung der Vitalprozesse ist minimal. Ich empfehle Eliminierung."

languages.text: « Les chances de survie de cette unité sont minces. Son utilité fonctionnelle dans l'éventualité d'une stabilisation des processus vitaux est minimale. Solution recommandée : l'élimination. »
languages.original_text: "The chances of this unit surviving are slim. Functional usefulness in the event of stabilisation of vital processes is minimal. Disposal is recommended."

traits.locale_text: « Les chances de survie de cette unité sont minces. Son utilité fonctionnelle dans l'éventualité d'une stabilisation des processus vitaux est minimale. Solution recommandée : l'élimination. »

languages.text: "Bu birimin yaşama ihtimali düşük. Yaşam işlevlerinin dengelenmesi durumunda göreceği işlev asgari olacaktır. İmhası tavsiye olunur."
languages.original_text: "The chances of this unit surviving are slim. Functional usefulness in the event of stabilisation of vital processes is minimal. Disposal is recommended."
